full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG SHAMBHA LA'I SMON LAM BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA RDZA SAG THU RGYAL PO MA NI BADZRA NAS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I @003B MANDAL BCAS BSKUL BA'I 'NGOR ^DAM PA'I MTSAN GYIS BYIN GYIS RLABS PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RANG SNANG GD'U DOL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI KHU BA CHOS RJE MKHAN PO YE SHES DGE LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
